answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!At your age, the most likely cause is benign hypertrophy of prostate. This can cause frequency of urination at night. Please consult an urologist.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: usually I get up twice to urinate in the night. sometimes in the early morning between 4am to 6 am  I have to go to bath room threce or 4 times. This happens once or twice in a fortnight. I have no diabetes. I take I take 1 mg. of allprozolam to get sleep.Can it be food related? Or any other causes?.
title: frequent urge tu urineate.
